tool_description: This API helps to query properties for sale, rent, sold,etc… to create a real estate site/application
name: Unofficial Redfin
title: Unofficial Redfin

api_list.name: mortgage/check-rates (Deprecated)
api_list.description: Finance tools to check mortgage rates

required_parameters.name: loanBalance
required_parameters.description: Loan balance

required_parameters.name: homePrice
required_parameters.description: Home price

required_parameters.name: homeValue
required_parameters.description: Home value

required_parameters.name: locationId
required_parameters.description: You need to use regex to extract the value of id field returned in .../auto-complete endpoint. Ex : '2_30749', 30749 is the value you need to extract from the string.

required_parameters.name: locationType
required_parameters.description: The value of type field returned in .../auto-complete

api_list.name: auto-complete
api_list.description: Get auto complete suggestions by term or phrase.

required_parameters.name: location
required_parameters.description: Any terms or phrases that you are familiar with.

api_list.name: mortgage/v2/check-rates
api_list.description: Finance tools to check mortgage rates

required_parameters.name: locationId
required_parameters.description: You need to use regex to extract the value of id field returned in .../auto-complete endpoint. Ex : '2_30749', 30749 is the value you need to extract from the string.

required_parameters.name: locationType
required_parameters.description: The value of type field returned in .../auto-complete

required_parameters.name: homeValue
required_parameters.description: Home value

required_parameters.name: homePrice
required_parameters.description: Home price

required_parameters.name: loanBalance
required_parameters.description: Loan balance

api_list.name: properties/get-parcel-bounds
api_list.description: Get parcel bounds info. This endpoint is used to get fipsCode and apn to pass in .../properties/get-flood-info endpoint.

required_parameters.name: propertyId
required_parameters.description: The value of propertyId field returned in .../properties/list endpoint.

api_list.name: properties/list
api_list.description: List properties for sales, sold, etc... with options and filters

required_parameters.name: region_type
required_parameters.description:
One of the following : -1:Unknowns|1:Neighborhood|2:Zip Code|4:State|5:County|6:City|7:School|8:School District|9:Service Region|10:Minor Civil Division|11:Country|30:CA Postal Code|31:CA Province|32:CA Provincial Division|33:CA Municipality|34:CA Forward Sortation Area
You need to use regex to examine the value of url field returned in .../auto-complete for suitable value. Ex : '/city/30749/...', it is city so it is 6 in this case.

required_parameters.name: region_id
required_parameters.description: You need to use regex to extract the value of id field returned in .../auto-complete endpoint. Ex : '2_30749', 30749 is the value you need to extract from the string.

required_parameters.name: uipt
required_parameters.description:
Property types, uses of the following : 1-Home|2-Condo|3-Townhouse|4-Multi-family|5-Land|6-Other|7-Manufactured|8-Co-op
Separated by comma for multiple options. Ex : 1,2,3,4,7,8

required_parameters.name: status
required_parameters.description: One of the following : 1-Active listings|8-Coming soon listings|9-Active + coming soon listings|130-Only under contract/pending|131-Active + under contract/pending

optional_parameters.name: financing_type
optional_parameters.description: Accepted Financing, one of the following : 1-FHA|2-VA

optional_parameters.name: time_on_market_range
optional_parameters.description:
Time on Redfin, you need to put the minus before/after every numbers. Ex :
1-:Less than 1 day|3-:Less than 3 days|7-|14-|30-|-30:More than 30 days|-60|-120|-:For any time

optional_parameters.name: pool_types
optional_parameters.description: One of the following : 1-Private pool|2-Community pool|3-Private or Community pool|4-No private pool

optional_parameters.name: primary_bed_on_main
optional_parameters.description: true : has primary bedroom on main floor

optional_parameters.name: unrated_schools
optional_parameters.description: true : Include unrated schools. Use along with school_rating parameter.

optional_parameters.name: walk_score
optional_parameters.description: Filter by walk score, you need to put the minus after every numbers. Ex : 10-|20-|30-|etc...

optional_parameters.name: school_rating
optional_parameters.description: Filter by school rate, you need to put the minus after every numbers. Ex : 1-|2-|3-|...|10-

optional_parameters.name: transit_score
optional_parameters.description: Filter by transit score, you need to put the minus after every numbers. Ex : 10-|20-|30-|etc...

optional_parameters.name: bike_score
optional_parameters.description: Filter by bike score, you need to put the minus after every numbers. Ex : 10-|20-|30-|etc...

optional_parameters.name: basement_types
optional_parameters.description: One of the following : 1-Finished|3-Unfinished. Separated by comma for multiple options. Ex : 1,3

optional_parameters.name: school_types
optional_parameters.description: Use along with school_rating parameter. One of the following : 1-Elementary schools|2-Middle schools|3-High schools. Separated by comma for multiple options. Ex : 1,2,3

optional_parameters.name: num_beds
optional_parameters.description: Filter by number of beds room at least. Ex : 2

optional_parameters.name: sold_within_days
optional_parameters.description: Use this parameter to list SOLD properties. If you pass this parameter, leave sf parameter empty.

optional_parameters.name: rd
optional_parameters.description:
Price reduce, you need to put the minus before/after every numbers. Ex :
1-:Less than 1 day|3-:Less than 3 days|7-|14-|30-|-30:More than 30 days|-60|-120|-:For any time

optional_parameters.name: sf
optional_parameters.description:
MLS listings, uses of the following : 1,7-Agent listed Homes|2-MLS listed foreclosures|3-For sale by owner|4-Foreclosures|5,6-New construction
Separated by comma for multiple options. Ex : 1,2,3,5,6,7

optional_parameters.name: pkg
optional_parameters.description: Garage spots 1-|2-|3-|4-|5- (You need to put the minus behind every numbers)

optional_parameters.name: num_baths
optional_parameters.description: Filter by number of baths at least. Ex : 2.5

optional_parameters.name: num_homes
optional_parameters.description: Number of items per response (Max 400). Redfin always return max 400 properties for every search, there is no paging feature.
